mapper.sql: agent_merchant_id, agent_merchant_name, agent_merchant_short_name, agent_identity_type, agent_identity_num, agent_identity_url, agent_phone, agent_phone_status, agent_email, agent_email_status, agent_qq, agent_status
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from agent_merchant_info
order by ${orderByClause}
select agent_merchant_id, agent_merchant_name from agent_merchant_info group by agent_merchant_id
select mer_id, merchant_name from merchant_info where parent_id = #{merchantId} group by mer_id
SELECT IFNULL( ( ( SELECT MAX((@rownum := @rownum + 1)) FROM (SELECT @rownum := 1000) r, merchant_info ) ), 1000 ) AS agentMerchantId
mapper.insert: insert into agent_merchant_info (agent_merchant_id, agent_merchant_name, agent_merchant_short_name, agent_identity_type, agent_identity_num, agent_identity_url, agent_phone, agent_phone_status, agent_email, agent_email_status, agent_qq, agent_status) values (#{agentMerchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentMerchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentMerchantShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentIdentityType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentIdentityNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentIdentityUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentPhoneStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentEmailStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
